availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. Peyton (Caldwell/Hopkins co, ky, house carpenter )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, house carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of Margaret Peyton. Married to Frina N. Peyton. Father of Sarah A. Peyton, James Peyton, and Susan Peyton. Resident in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. House carpenter in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 370B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Hopkins, p. 726.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Tennessee, p. 527B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Missouri, Webster County, High Prairie, 134, p. 298D.
